subject: Urgent: No Response Regarding Order SSN2784
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,
I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to follow up on my order
SSN2784, which I have already inquired about multiple times over the past
week. This is now the fourth email I’ve sent, and I have yet to receive any
response.
Could you please let me know where my order is and provide an update as
soon as possible? I would appreciate a prompt reply, as the delay and lack
of communication are becoming very frustrating.
Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from
you soon.
Best regard Cristian Pezzotti

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 4482。
